metadata.name: Antibirth Runes
metadata.description:
In the Antibirth mod, there were 4 runes that were cut from Repentance along with 2 more runes that were unused. This mod brings them back!
[h1]ğ€ğ§ğ­ğ¢ğ›ğ¢ğ«ğ­ğ¡ ğ‘ğ®ğ§ğğ¬[/h1] [list] [*]Features EID & Encyclopedia support [*]Features Magic Chalk, Andromeda, Epiphany, Fiend Folio, Rep+, Retribution Support [/list] [u]___________________________________[/u]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/X4nGns7.png[/img] All runes are unlockable by completing the stated challenge [img]https://i.imgur.com/X4nGns7.png[/img]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/e1tGcWD.png[/img] [u]Gebo[/u] = Interacts with any machine or beggar in the room. Donates 7 coins to donation machines, plays beggars 6 times, plays blood machines 4 times, plays other machines 5 times. Machines and beggars have an increased chance to pay out or explode, even paying out at only one play (Bloody Mary) [img]https://i.imgur.com/j1uZxxz.png[/img] [u]Kenaz[/u] = Poisons all enemies in a room (Scat Man) [img]https://i.imgur.com/D1oVdwF.png[/img] [u]Fehu[/u] = Half of monsters in a room get the Midas Touch effect for 5 seconds (Cantripped) [img]https://i.imgur.com/xaxZPnB.png[/img] [u]Othala[/u] = Gives Isaac a random item that he already holds (Seeing Double) [img]https://i.imgur.com/qmJ8aLd.png[/img] [u]Ingwaz[/u] = Opens all chests in a room (Baptism by Fire) [img]https://i.imgur.com/J43GFfs.png[/img] [u]Sowilo[/u] = Revives all enemies killed in a room (Red Redemption)
[u]___________________________________[/u]

kittenchilly, BrakeDude, Sillst, MichaelÂ¿?, and Kotry
